![home bg](https://getcobblestone.com/_next/image/?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fhomepage-masthead-cropped.67691410.png&w=3840&q=75)
## Your stronghold against application fraud.
Say goodbye to fraud, reduce bad debt, and streamline leasing with Cobblestone. The only all–in–one leasing platform that cuts no corners.
[Start now](https://getcobblestone.com/</get-started/>)
[How it works](https://getcobblestone.com/</product-overview/>)
### All-in-one tenant screening that doesn’t miss a thing.
Protect your assets from every type of application fraud. Get set up in minutes, save your team countless hours, and follow procedure with ease.
![Placeholdercomp](https://cobblestonelab.wpengine.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/placeholdercomp.svg)
#### Comprehensive
Our all-in-one system ensures one system sees all. Nothing escapes Cobblestone’s scrutiny.
![Placeholdericon](https://cobblestonelab.wpengine.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/placeholdericon.svg)
#### Automated
Spend less time reviewing applications, eliminate human error, and accelerate leasing with an intuitive, guided application process.
![Placeholdericon 1](https://cobblestonelab.wpengine.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/placeholdericon-1.svg)
#### Effortless
We’ll partner with you to ensure a smooth setup, requiring minimal retraining for leasing teams so you can hit the ground running.
## our platform
### Build a barrier between you and fraudsters.
Fraud is increasingly easy to commit and difficult to detect. Sophisticated operators need powerful defenses to protect their assets. That’s where our platform comes in.
[Jump in](https://getcobblestone.com/</product-overview/>)
#### Fraud Detection
Reduce bad debt with best-in-class detection methods for ID validation, income fraud, and even advanced synthetic identities.
[Learn more](https://getcobblestone.com/</fraud-detection/>)
#### Workflow Automation
Keep leasing teams on policy, easily audit decisions, and track key performance indicators.
[Learn more](https://getcobblestone.com/</workflow-automation/>)
#### End-to-End Screening
Go beyond fraud detection with our all-in-one platform for income verification, credit/criminal/eviction checks, and identity verification. Capture and analyze all relevant data to make a decision in one-place.
[Learn more](https://getcobblestone.com/</complete-screening/>)
## Verify income automatically, without lifting a finger
Automate income verification with AI-powered document scanning, bank linking and payroll linking.
## integrations
### Works with everything you do.
Build on your existing workflows with minimal staff training needed. Cobblestone works perfectly with your property management system and favorite tools.
## SOLUTIONS
### Paving the way across asset classes.
#### Multi-Family
Eliminate fraud and streamline processes across your multi-family portfolio.
[Learn more](https://getcobblestone.com/</multi-family/>)
#### Single Family
Stay consistent across spread out portfolios and drive peak asset performance with a platform natively built for SFR.
[Learn more](https://getcobblestone.com/</single-family/>)
## Student Housing
Handle the rush of seasonal applications effortlessly and without errors.
[Learn more](https://getcobblestone.com/</student-housing/>)
## Lease Up
Achieve residential stabilization quickly and with fewer staff.
[Learn more](https://getcobblestone.com/</lease-up/>)
## Centralized Leasing
Without an on-site leasing office, get everything behind Cobblestone with features custom-built for centralized teams.
[Learn more](https://getcobblestone.com/</centralized-leasing/>)
## Tackle fraud today.
[Start now](https://getcobblestone.com/</get-started/>)
[](https://getcobblestone.com/</>)
© 2025 Cobblestone Labs, Inc. All rights reserved.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Cobblestone**

**Mission**: Cobblestone is on a mission to reduce delinquency in the real estate market through sophisticated software that targets fraud reduction for institutional landlords. This approach not only minimizes losses but also automates many tedious processes associated with tenant applications.

**Founded**: 2023

**Background**: Launched as part of Y Combinator's Batch W23, Cobblestone aims to streamline leasing by providing an all-in-one leasing platform that addresses the increasing threat of application fraud. Their strategy hinges on a blend of automation and rigorous fraud detection.

**Location**: New York City

**Team Size**: A compact team of 3, showcasing a nimble startup approach while ensuring agility in product development and customer service.

**Key Leadership**: Jared Friedman serves as their Group Partner, bringing valuable insights and guidance to the fledgling startup.

**Market Focus**: The company is categorized under fintech, real estate, and B2B sectors, targeting primarily institutional landlords who need reliable tools to enhance their leasing processes.

**What They Do**: Cobblestone provides a suite of features designed to:
- **Detect Fraud**: Advanced methods for identifying application fraud, ID validation, and income verification.
- **Automate Workflows**: Streamline leasing processes to reduce human error, ensuring teams can operate efficiently.
- **Ensure Comprehensive Screening**: End-to-end checks for credit, criminal history, if applicable, and evictions, all in one platform.

**Their Offering**: 
- An intuitive application process that keeps everything organized and simplifies the tenant screening phase. 
- Integration capabilities with existing property management systems to facilitate a seamless transition.
- Specific solutions tailored for multiple housing types, including multi-family, single-family, and student housing.

**Why It Matters**: In an era where fraud is rampant and evolving, Cobblestone positions itself as the guardian of institutional landlords, enabling them to protect their assets efficiently while also enhancing operational workflow. If you're in the real estate sector, especially as a landlord or property manager, consider how much easier your life could be with Cobblestone’s platform.

For more information, check out their website: [Cobblestone](https://getcobblestone.com).
